summary: A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.
cast: Leslie Howard|Bette Davis|Genevieve Tobin|Dick Foran|Humphrey Bogart|Joe Sawyer|Porter Hall|Charley Grapewin|Paul Harvey|Eddie Acuff|Adrian Morris|Nina Campana|Slim Thompson|John Alexander|Arthur Aylesworth|Jack Cheatham|Jim Farley|George Guhl|Gus Leonard|Tom McGuire|Henry O'Neill|Addison Richards|Francis J. Scheid|Perc Teeple
director: Director: Archie Mayo (as Archie L. Mayo)
title: El bosque petrificado
